A.I.M. Infector.description: A virulent attacker who prevents healing and passes negative effects to his targets.

A.I.M. Monstrosity.description: A massive brute that gains strength at the expense of vulnerability.

A.I.M. Assaulter.description: An aggressive soldier who sacrifices healing for rapid attacks.

A.I.M. Researcher.description: A focused healer who applies and removes negative effects.

A.I.M. Security.description: A resilient guard who taunts while healing herself and slowing her enemies.

Ant-Man.description: A master thief skilled at disabling powerful opponents with the help of his Pym Particle powered suit.

Mordo.description: A powerful sorcerer who weakens his enemies with forbidden magic.

Black Panther.description: An agile, relentless hunter who shreds his enemies with rapid attacks.

Black Widow.description: A stealthy saboteur who steals enemy advantages and delivers disabling attacks.

Bullseye.description: A ruthless mercenary who takes down single targets with focused damage and perfect accuracy.

Cable.description: A time-traveler from the future who can manipulate turn order and charge up attacks to blast his enemies.

Captain America.description: A resilient leader who provides energy to his team while blocking enemy attacks.

Captain Marvel.description: A powerful cosmic soldier who breaks down the defenses of multiple foes and gains overwhelming power in Binary form.

Carnage.description: An insane brawler that viciously tears through foes with negative effects, attacking more frequently as their health decreases.

Crossbones.description: A vengeful, die hard bruiser with a devastating explosion attack.

Daredevil.description: A tough bruiser who delivers bonus attacks, chain attacks, and counterattacks.

Deadpool.description: A magical unicorn who specializes in stab-shooting vulnerable targets.

Doctor Strange.description: Sorcerer Supreme and versatile healer with the ability to remove effects from friends and foes.

Drax.description: An unpredictable, taunting attacker with rapid attacks that drain health.

Elektra.description: A stealthy assassin capable of dealing immense damage to a single target.

Gamora.description: An aggressive warrior who can attack again after defeating an enemy.

Groot.description: A resilient healer who defends allies and has a chance to revive. Protective of Rocket Raccoon.

Hand Assassin.description: A quick attacker who prevents healing on a single target.

Hand Blademaster.description: A sword-wielding ninja who assails his target with multiple attacks.

Hand Archer.description: A deadly archer who can clear effects off the enemy team.

Hand Sorceress.description: A mystical healer who drains health when attacking.

Hand Sentry.description: An expert martial artist who conceals his allies with smoke bombs.

Hawkeye.description: An expert archer who delivers unavoidable attacks to disable his foes.

Hulk.description: An incredibly tough taunter who gets stronger when damaged.

Hydra Grenadier.description: Hydra special weapons experts deliver explosive grenade attacks.

Hydra Rifle Trooper.description: Hydra assault troops overwhelm enemies with storms of bullets.

Hydra Sniper.description: Hydra snipers take careful aim before shooting to ensure perfect accuracy.

Hydra Scientist.description: Hydra scientists use experimental treatments to heal their comrades.

Hydra Armored Guard.description: The most loyal and resilient Hydra guards are trained to sacrifice themselves for the cause.

Iron Fist.description: A versatile martial artist with healing abilities and a powerful single target attack.

Iron Man.description: A versatile damage dealer with high armor and low health.

Jessica Jones.description: A resilient fighter who removes positive effects from enemies and clears negative effects from allies.

Juggernaut.description: An unstoppable tank who taunts his foes and charges for devastating damage.

Kingpin.description: A demanding crime boss who summons bodyguards and orders allies to attack.

Korath the Pursuer.description: A relentless tracker who uses cybernetic enhancements to mark and disable his targets.

Kree Noble.description: The elite classes of Kree society order others to vanquish their enemies.

Kree Cyborg.description: An elite warrior armed with cybernetics that enhance speed, and strength.

Kree Reaper.description: A vicious hunter who doesn't give her prey a chance to recover.

Kree Oracle.description: A purifier who utilizes Kree technology to regenerate and cleanse his allies.

Kree Royal Guard.description: A heavily armored Kree warrior who intercepts attackers with brutal counterattacks.

Loki.description: The Asgardian god of Mischief who misleads and confuses his foes.

Luke Cage.description: An extremely tough taunting protector with high damage and health.

Magneto.description: A master of magnetic fields who can shift enemy positions and empower his Brotherhood allies.

Mantis.description: A cosmic healer who can stun foes and redistribute health to an injured ally. Her abilities are stronger in Raids.

Mercenary Soldier.description: A versatile soldier who can inflict area damage with grenades.

Mercenary Sniper.description: An expert marksman who can deliver high damage with a single shot.

Mercenary Lieutenant.description: A field combat leader who makes allies faster and stronger.

Mercenary Riot Guard.description: A tough fighter who draws fire and reduces incoming damage.

Mercenary Bodyguard.description: A bodyguard who distracts enemies to protect allies.

Minn-Erva.description: A brilliant Kree geneticist that uses her mastery of biology to weaken foes and replenish her allies.

Mystique.description: A covert shapeshifter skilled at disabling stealthed targets and manipulating enemies into attacking each other.

Ms. Marvel.description: A plucky Super Hero brawler who assists and generates ability energy for her allies.

Nebula.description: A ruthless attacker who assails opponents with frequent attacks.

Nick Fury.description: The legendary leader who spreads advantages to allies and summons S.H.I.E.L.D. agents.

Night Nurse.description: An excellent healer who is able to deploy a wide variety of health restoration abilities.

Nobu.description: A mysterious ninja master who summons Hand Ninjas and specializes in ambushing his opponents.

Okoye.description: A Wakandan general adept at disrupting the battlefield with precision strikes using her Vibranium Spear.

Punisher.description: A vicious blaster who deals high piercing damage to multiple targets.

Pyro.description: A hotheaded fire-starter who excels at burning enemies in an area to inflict damage over time.

Quake.description: A S.H.I.E.L.D. agent who disrupts the enemy team by weakening groups of foes and removing their advantages.

Ravager Boomer.description: A heavily armed space pirate who supports his allies with plasma cannon fire.

Ravager Stitcher.description: A spacefaring doctor who prioritizes healing the most severe wounds over those that will merely leave a cool scar.

Ravager Bruiser.description: A boarding expert who uses an energy S.H.I.E.L.D to deflect attacks.

Red Skull.description: The leader of Hydra who commands Hydra troops to fire on his enemies.

Rocket Raccoon.description: An aggressive scrapper who inflicts terrible damage to foes at range. Prefers to team up with Groot.

Ronan the Accuser.description: A Kree fanatic who summons Kree minions while denying the abilities of his foes with brutal strikes.

Sabretooth.description: A savage, regenerating brute that shreds single targets and chains to additional enemies.

Scarlet Witch.description: A mystical controller that prolongs negative effects and redistributes health across her teammates.

Scientist Supreme.description: A mad scientist who converts negative effects to positive effects while healing her allies.

S.H.I.E.L.D. Assault.description: A jetpack assault soldier who provides air cover with area attacks.

S.H.I.E.L.D. Medic.description: A S.H.I.E.L.D. agent trained to provide emergency medical attention in the field.

Spider-Man.description: A quick attacker that weakens opponents and evades incoming attacks.

Star-Lord.description: A charismatic leader who generates ability energy for allies and distracts enemies.

S.H.I.E.L.D. Operative.description: An agent who specializes in protecting vulnerable VIP's with stealth and emergency medical aid.

S.H.I.E.L.D. Trooper.description: S.H.I.E.L.D.'s frontline soldiers hold the line with defensive tactics and counterattacks.

S.H.I.E.L.D. Security.description: A non-lethal combat specialist with a protective S.H.I.E.L.D and a baton that stuns opponents.

Storm.description: A powerful weather controller that charges up devastating attacks to lead her mutant allies to victory.

Thanos.description: A Titan Eternal who delivers crushing blows that drain his foes and taunt his enemies.

Thor.description: The God of Thunder who deals great damage and weakens multiple foes.

Green Goblin.description: A fierce villain who strips positive effects from his foes with fire and explosives.

Spider-Man (Miles).description: Miles Morales controls the field with web blasts and electrical shocks that prolong negative effects and apply Disrupted.

Ultimus.description: A Kree warlord and eternal who generates overwhelming energy blasts and force fields.

Ultron.description: A powerful robotic tyrant that summons drones to eliminate any threat to his mechanical regime.

Ultron Fortifier.description: An Ultron drone who generates protective force fields.

Ultron Incinerator.description: An Ultron drone who blasts targets with devastating heat rays.

Ultron Accelerator.description: An Ultron drone who attacks targets rapidly with high-velocity rail guns.

Ultron Fabricator.description: An Ultron drone who deploys nanobots to reconstruct allies.

Ultron Reinforcer.description: An Ultron construction drone who taunts enemies to absorb damage.

Venom.description: A symbiotic monstrosity that tears into opponents and spreads harmful effects.

Vision.description: A synthetic being that avoids enemy attacks and disables his foes.

War Machine.description: An armored soldier who uses an arsenal of weapons to bombard his foes. More powerful in Alliance Wars.

Wasp.description: A highly elusive blaster capable of stunning and chaining to multiple opponents.

Winter Soldier.description: An elite Hydra agent who assaults his chosen target with deadly attacks that prevent healing.

Wolverine.description: A mutant armed with adamantium claws that ignore armor and tear through his opponents.

Yondu.description: A leader who can summon Ravager allies and deliver high piercing damage.
